snippet: Johnny Gaudreau scored twice to lead No. 4 Boston College to a 6-3 victory over Northeastern and give the Eagles their fourth consecutive Beanpot title.
abstract: Boston College beats Northeastern, 6-3, to earn their fourth consecutive Beanpot title; other college hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Johnny Gaudreau scored twice to lead No. 4 Boston College to a 6-3 victory over Northeastern and give the Eagles their fourth consecutive Beanpot title.

headline.seo: Boston College Defeats Northeastern to Take Beanpot Title
headline.main: Boston College Takes Beanpot Title Again
